text:
1. Stand in front of the speed bag.
2. Raise both hands and make a fist.
3. Start swinging the fists alternately towards the speed bag.
4. Maintain a fast and rhythmic pace.
5. Keep the hands and wrists relaxed.
6. Focus on hitting the speed bag with precision.
7. Continue the motion for a desired duration.
8. Gradually increase the speed and intensity if desired.
9. Slow down and stop when finished.
